fields.headline: One ticket wins £4m Lotto jackpot
fields.bodyText: One ticket holder scooped Saturday's £4.1m Lotto jackpot, operator Camelot said. The numbers drawn were 5, 6, 7, 18, 28, 40, with bonus ball 12. Draw machine Opal and set of balls one was used. Camelot said 22 tickets matched five numbers plus the bonus ball to win £58,726 each, 736 won £1,097 each by matching five numbers, 41,161 matched four numbers to win £43 each, while 749,156 won £10 each for matching three balls. Wednesday's estimated jackpot is £2.6m. There was no winner of the Lotto Extra jackpot, where the numbers drawn were 4, 7, 12, 16, 23 and 25.
